data.title: Sheppard Mullin
data.text:
Paul Bost is special counsel in the firm's Intellectual Property Practice Group in the firm's Century City office. Paul is a holistic trademark and copyright practitioner, representing his clients in federal court and before the Trademark Trial and Appeal Board, and managing his clientsâ€™ IP portfolios.

Areas of Practice

Paul manages and participates in all aspects of federal court pre-litigation and litigation. The vast majority of these cases are trademark, copyright, and right of publicity actions. Additionally, Paul manages trademark portfolios, clearance, and prosecution for clients in a variety of industries.
